subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A reported seven-year, $100 million contract between the Boston Red Sox and Dustin Pedroia is considerably less than what Robinson Cano is thought to be seeking from the Yankees.
snippet: A reported seven-year, $100 million contract between the Boston Red Sox and Dustin Pedroia is considerably less than what Robinson Cano is thought to be seeking from the Yankees.
